noticias.title: LOCAL- Man kills 4 relatives, self in shootings at home and nursing facility in Texas
noticias.description: Robstown police said a 60-year-old man is believed to have killed his elderly father, his wife, and two other relatives as well as himself on Friday.
noticias.author: Phil Helsel, Dystany Muse

noticias.title: LOCAL- Koch officials: President Trump's trade tariffs hurt Americans
noticias.description: Charles Koch warned that acting “in protectionist ways” erects “barriers which make everyone worse off.”
noticias.author: Fredreka Schouten

noticias.title: LOCAL- Trump CFO Thrust Into Legal Spotlight
noticias.description: Allen Weisselberg, the CFO of the Trump Organization, has been drawn into legal matters swirling around President Trump.
noticias.author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien

noticias.title: LOCAL- Trump 1 CFO Thrust Into Legal Spotlight
noticias.description: Allen Weisselberg, the CFO of the Trump Organization, has been drawn into legal matters swirling around President Trump.
noticias.author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
